title: Intrinsic Motivation
content: Intrinsic motivation is when people are driven in their own direction by curiosity, ambition, or passion for the cause.  People will work harder and for longer and feel more fulfilled by the work.  Although some people are so conditioned to respond to external motivators, theyâ€™re unsure what they even strive for or find meaning in.
question: What do you feel intrinsically motivated to do?

title: Extrinsic Motivation
content: Extrinsic Motivation when someone is driven by the reward or compensation for completing the task.  As soon as the compensation is removed, the motivation goes with it.  Giving extrinsic rewards for behavior someone is already intrinsically motivated to do makes them less passionate about doing it because it then feels like a job.
question: What are some extrinsic motivators in your life?
